DataElement.preferredName: Caregiver Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Discussion with Oncologist About Wishes About Care if Dying Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not their loved one has discussed with the oncologist any particular wishes they have about the care they will receive if they are dying.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Caregiver Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Oncologist Discussion Wishes About Care if Dying
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional._A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care._A physician who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer._An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic._A question about whether the patient has discussed with their oncologist the care they want to receive if they are dying.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Caregiver Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Concepts.definition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.
A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Property.preferredName: Oncologist Discussion Wishes About Care if Dying
Property.preferredDefinition: A doctor who specializes in treating cancer. Some oncologists specialize in a particular type of cancer treatment. For example, a radiation oncologist specializes in treating cancer with radiation.:An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.:A question about whether the patient has discussed with their oncologist the care they want to receive if they are dying.

Concepts.definition: A physician who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer.
An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.
A question about whether the patient has discussed with their oncologist the care they want to receive if they are dying.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PTPQ:Prognosis and Treatment Perceptions Questionnaire as referenced in Associations Among Prognostic Understanding, Quality of Life, El-Jawahri A, et.al., 2014
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 5/28/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has your loved one and their
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has your loved one and their oncologist discussed any particular wishes about the care they would want to receive if they were dying?
